AR 43. Targets related to material risks and opportunities may be the same as or distinct from
targets tied to material impacts. For example, a target to ensure equal access to finance for
underserved consumers could both reduce discrimination impacts on those consumers
and enlarge the undertakingâ€™s pool of customers.
